DAVID N. KROGSENO
DISTRICT REPRESENTATIVE!
MISS MARYELLEN SMITH
March 23, 1967
The Rev. Colman J. Barry, O.S.B.
President
Saint John's University
Coilegeville, Minnesota
Dear Rev. Barry:
Thank you for your thoughtful letter and the attached
article on S. 1160 and H.R. 6736, the Public Television Act
of 1967.
The House version of this bill is currently pending,
with no action scheduled, before the House Committee on
Interstate and Foreign Commerce. However, the Senate Commerce
Committee plans to hold hearings on S. 1160 in April. I
appreciate the great benefit that can be derived from the use
of both educational radio and educational TV. When the Public
Television Act of 1967 is brought before the full House of
Representatives for debate and final action, you may be certain
that I will give your views my most favorable consideration.
Sincerely,
